name:
Donkey Kong™
Country Returns 3D
description:
Go ape with the swingin’ king of the
jungle! Donkey Kong and his simian
sidekick Diddy Kong are back for
more action-packed platforming antics
in Donkey Kong Country Returns 3D,
an enhanced version of Wii adventure
Donkey Kong Country Returns, only
on Nintendo 3DS and Nintendo 3DS
XL!
